name: DeepTap
description:
DeepTap — Professional Deep‑Linking Simplified
DeepTap helps developers create seamless deep linking experiences  in mobile applications. With easy setup, smart routing, and enterprise-grade reliability, it ensures users land exactly where they should—boosting engagement, reducing drop-offs, supporting advanced analytics, and custom domains.
